author: bundocka
body:
Firmware recently updated to saturate the MET if there is a saturated ECAL or HCAL TP in the event. This gains a few % efficiency for large MET, with a few % increase in rate [1].

Also updates to plotting to show saturation value when running hardware/emulator comparisons.

[1]
https://indico.cern.ch/event/611784/contributions/2467403/attachments/1407797/2158932/MetSaturation_up.pdf
title: Saturate MET with saturated towers
